basicInfo.name: Chancellor
basicInfo.flavor: After capturing multiple spies by himself, Chancellor was promoted to Leader of the Royal Guards. The spies claim that night they fought a devil.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 50% of Physical Attack plus 60% of Defense 1 time(s).
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 60% of Physical Attack plus 70% of Defense.

Skill 1.name: Pulverize
Skill 1.desc:
1 Enemy (By Highest No. of Buffs)
 - 100% chance to inflict 3 Buff Removal(s).
 - 100% chance to inflict Defense Reduction. [Duration: 5 Turn(s)]
 - Deals damage equal to 120% of Physical Attack plus 135% of Defense 1 time(s).
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 145% of Physical Attack plus 165% of Defense.
 - Increases Effect: Defense Reduction to 44%.

Skill 2.name: Earthsplitter
Skill 2.desc:
3 Enemies (Back Row First)
 - Deals damage equal to 75% of Physical Attack plus 85% of Defense 1 time(s).
 - 100% chance to inflict Increased Miss Chance. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 85% of Physical Attack plus 100% of Defense.
 - Increases Effect: Increased Miss Chance to 60%.
超越2段階達成効果
 - Adds Effect: 100% chance to inflict 24% All Attack Reduction. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]

Passive.name: Intimidating Presence
Passive.desc:
Self
 - Heals HP equal to 165% of the caster's Defense when HP falls to 50% or lower. [1 Time(s) per Battle]
 - All Enemies
 - Inflicts Damage Reduction. [Always Active]
 - 3 Enemies
 - Deals 1285 Fixed damage 1 time(s) upon using any attack 3 time(s).
 - Deals 1930 Fixed damage 1 time(s) upon using any attack 3 time(s).
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Effect: Damage Reduction to 13%.
 - Increases Damage: To 1930 Fixed damage.
超越6段階達成効果
 - Self
 - Adds Effect: All Damage Immunity when HP falls to 50% or lower. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)] [Once per Battle]

transcendence.transcend_7: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_8: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_9: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_10: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_11: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_12: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.

profile.likes: Aragon, Rook, chivalry, honor, knights, exercise, meat, white wine, swordsmanship training, butterflies, people with conviction
profile.story: After capturing multiple spies by himself, Chancellor was promoted to Leader of the Royal Guards. The spies claim that night they fought a devil.

basicInfo.name: Chancellor
basicInfo.flavor: Chancellor met Rook for the first time when he became Captain of the Guard. Rook's presence reminded him of what a true soldier should be, inspiring him to train diligently.

スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 105% of Physical Attack.
 - Increases Damage: To 125% of Magic Attack.

3 Enemies (Back Row First)
 - Deals damage equal to 65% of Physical Attack plus 75% of Defense 1 time(s).

 - Increases Damage: To 65% of Physical Attack.
 - Increases Damage: To 75% of Magic Attack.

Self

profile.story: Chancellor met Rook for the first time when he became Captain of the Guard. Rook's presence reminded him of what a true soldier should be, inspiring him to train diligently.

basicInfo.name: Chancellor
basicInfo.flavor: Chancellor became a soldier out of respect for Knox, but after Knox's corruption, his admiration turned to hatred. He vowed to live as a true soldier and to never succumb to evil.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 40% of Physical Attack plus 50% of Defense 1 time(s).
スキル強化効果

 - Increases Damage: To 50% of Magic Attack.

スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 95% of Physical Attack.
 - Increases Damage: To 110% of Magic Attack.

スキル強化効果

 - Increases Damage: To 70% of Magic Attack.
